thread.title: Harshal Savla

author: Harshal Savla
title: Harshal Savla
text: I was referred Dial A Flight by one of my friend and customer service team helped me to get best deal for my Dubai and Australia trip with my family. They are very professional and good customer service. Only downside was that the customer service manager did not advise me on free ETA service and I ended up spending extra Â£50 for that service for me and my family online. Otherwise I would love to book my next holiday again with Dial A Flight
